summary: A stranger with mysterious intentions comes to stay the night at a secluded country home, but what he finds inside is a family torn apart by a violent past and a secret more deadly than he expected.
cast: Patrick Breen|Alexandra Chando|Nina Lisandrello|Henderson Wade|Betsy Aidem|Richard Bekins|Charlie Hewson|Per Melita|Gretchen McGowan|Court Young|Victoria Dalpe|Jonathan Gelatt
title: The Bleeding
